info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 03 at 2:06PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Bear River at Border affecting Bear Lake Valley zone. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Bear River Border 7.5 6.7 Wed 1 pm MDT 7.0 7.8 8.0 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. Lowland flooding of fields and pasture land will occur. Driveways to low lying homes next to the river near Dingle may have water across them. Some basements of low lying homes next to the river will start to have water come in them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
